metadata.title: CVE-2015-8547 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The CoreUserInputHandler::doMode function in core/coreuserinputhandler.cpp in Quassel 0.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via the "/op *" command in a query.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-8547` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

quassel - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
quassel-client - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
quassel-core - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
quassel-data - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quassel package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2').
